written_book_content.author: Factory Builder
written_book_content.title: Factory Builder
pages:
["
",[{"text":"  Factory Builder","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"gold","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"            by devilexe3","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
","
","
","
",[{"text":"    A book about all","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"    there is about","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
",[{"text":"    this minigame.","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
"]

[[{"text":"       TUTORIAL","bold":true,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
",[{"text":"You can go to your plot by using 
     ","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false},{"text":"/trigger plot","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":true}],"
","
",[{"text":"You can buy stuff from the barrel in the corner of your plot","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
",[{"text":"You can only place tiles when you are strictly inside your plot","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
"]

[[{"text":"You can only destroy tiles with the Destroy Tool","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
",[{"text":"Generators create different items which can be crafted into other items more valuable","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
",[{"text":"Items can be moved around with conveyors, elevators and chutes","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
"]

[[{"text":"Items can only be sold with Selling Platforms","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
",[{"text":"You can flip tile orientation by crouching","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
",[{"text":"Your plot gets automatically saved when you leave","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
",[{"text":"If you don't know how to get started, check out the plot at spawn (/trigger spawn)","bold":false,"italic":false,"color":"black","underlined":false}],"
","
"]
